title: A sermon preach'd before the Queen at White-Hall, March the XXth, 1691/2 by John, Lord Archbishop of Canterbury.
author: Tillotson, John, 1630-1694.
publisher: Printed for Brabazon Aylmer ..., and William Rogers ...,
notes: Half title: His Grace the Lord Archbishop of Canterbury's sermon before the Queen, March 20th, 1691/2.
Later published with title: God the only happiness of man.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
